name: Eesha Krupa Building
clue: The building is named after a famous Indian actress who played in Jannat2 + the building's second half is a common name for a place of worship in India.

name: Example Location 2
clue: This place has the best view of the sunrise in the entire city(Chicken Ghar).

name: Example Location 3
clue: Where knowledge meets technology, students gather in multitudes.
